assignments.description: This assignment will add the feedback recordtype names, icons and descriptions to a collection so we can show the recordtypes as icons instead of a lookup or picklist.
assignments.name: assFeedbackIcons
assignments.label: assFeedbackIcons

assignments.description: This assignment clears the collection elements for the quickchoice component. Otherwise it will show the icons multiple times in the next screen after create.
assignments.name: assFeedbackItemsEmpty
assignments.label: assFeedbackItemsEmpty

Flow.description: This screenflow is created to give users the option to add feedback (bug, compliment, feature request) to Salesforce.
Flow.interviewLabel: Feedback - SCFL01 - Add Feedback via Utility Bar {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Feedback - SCFL01 - Add Feedback via Utility Bar

fields.name: dtTitleBug
fields.fieldText: Report a Bug

fields.name: dtDescriptionBug
fields.fieldText:
Please provide all the details including all the steps you've produced to come to this bug. In the description field you can paste your screenshots.


﻿

fields.name: dtValidationBug
fields.fieldText: Please insert all fields!

fields.name: txtSubjectBug
fields.fieldText: Subject

fields.name: dtTitleBusinessIdea
fields.fieldText: Share your Business Idea

fields.name: dtDescriptionIdea
fields.fieldText:
Please provide us with the details what new business idea you would like to see. In the description field you can add images to clarify your idea.



﻿

fields.name: dtValidationIdea
fields.fieldText: Please insert all fields!

fields.name: txtSubjectIdea
fields.fieldText: Subject

fields.name: dtTitleCompliment
fields.fieldText: Give a Compliment

fields.name: dtDescription
fields.fieldText:
Do you want to give a colleague a compliment, or do you like how things are going or do you like certain (new) features in Salesforce? Let us know!


﻿

fields.name: dtValidationCompliment
fields.fieldText: Please insert all fields!

fields.name: chgType
fields.fieldText: Type

fields.name: txtSubjectCompliment
fields.fieldText: Subject

fields.name: dtTitleFeature
fields.fieldText: Request for a new Feature

fields.name: dtDescriptionFeature
fields.fieldText:
Please provide us with the details what new or improved feature you would like to see. In the description field you can paste your mocks.


﻿

fields.name: dtValidationFeature
fields.fieldText: Please insert all fields!

fields.name: txtSubjectFeature
fields.fieldText: Subject
